attributes.action: provide an integrated public transport infrastructure so that there is a viable and affordable alternative to car use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have a public transport network that is the most expensive in Western Europe.  Trains are overcrowded and unreliable.  Buses are expensive, and outside of major cities, stop running in the early evening.  What alternative do we have but to drive?  If there was an integrated public transport infrastructure, perhaps there wouldn't be a need for a tracking and pricing policy.
